BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.extractor.TableExtractor.extractTablesFromExpression(ExpressionSegment) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.segment.dml.expr.simple.ColumnWithJoinOperatorSegment.getText() calls toString() on an instance of a class that hasn't overridden toString()
